ygData.subject: RE: Purity belt... *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: FYI dragoons in nektulos actually DO have dragoon dirks.  I killed one a couple weeks ago, green but still killed the level 44 cleric i was with and almost
ygData.messageBody:
FYI dragoons in nektulos actually DO have dragoon dirks. I killed one a
couple weeks ago, green but still killed the level 44 cleric i was with and
almost killed me. he had a long sword and a dragoon dirk. i didn't
actually check it, but i looted it and it disappeared, leading me to believe
it was a dirk since i had one in the bank.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 9 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Sean Gifford [mailto:giffords@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 4:06 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Purity belt... *SPOILER*
>
>
> From: "Sean Gifford" <giffords@...>
>
> I'm just glad you don't have to get the Dragoon Dirks, from Dragoons )
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: John Kim <kim@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 11:02 AM
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Purity belt... *SPOILER*
>
>
> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> On Wed, 14 Jul 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> > In the name of Erollisi I hope there is another way to get
> these than by
> > killing one of the sisters. I feel dirty at even the
> thought that there
> are
> > Necromancers hunting sisters for there pelts, I mean belts.
> I guess I
> will
> > have to make a pilgrimage to that island and cast my belt
> into the sea. I
> > have much pennance to do for profitting by the death of such an
> unfortunate.
>
> There's a quest to return a purity belt stolen by the pirates
> one island over. They are L15-19ish from what I saw, but
> grouped. Probably shouldn't attempt it with a full group in
> their 20s (since you can't run to a zone in the OOT). Instead
> of returning the belt to complete the quest, you could always
> keep it. Talk to the head Sister of Erollisi.
>
> Yeah, it is kind of silly that they put the item on L10 mobs
> for evil folks, but L18 mobs for good folks. Wish Verant
> would put full suits of plate on all those dark elf ancilles
> and dragoons I see in Mistmoore, West Commonlands, and
> Nektulos. :-)
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
